sourcesContent: import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; export default function App() { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); function encode(data) { return Object.keys(data) .map( (key) => encodeURIComponent(key) + "=" + encodeURIComponent(data[key]) ) .join("&"); } const onSubmit = (data) => { debugger; console.log(data); }; console.log(errors); return (
